workExperience.companyDescription: WiseX is India’s First & Largest Neo-realty investment platform by Aurum PropTech.
responsibilities: Engineered high-performance web applications using Node.js, Laravel, Lumen, and MySQL.
Optimized application performance by refactoring code, improving data handling, and managing resources efficiently.
Integrated Razorpay Smart Collect to automate payment collections via virtual accounts and UPI IDs.
Built and maintained scalable microservices for seamless performance in a high-traffic environment.

workExperience.companyDescription: GreenHonchos is a full-stack D2C enabler, an ecommerce agency that provides end-to-end ecommerce solutions for D2C brands including digital branding.
responsibilities: Led client meetings to gather requirements and oversee the development process from planning to delivery.
Led the team in planning, development, and execution to achieve project goals.
Spearheaded the development of REST APIs and high-performance applications for e-commerce platforms.
Integrated security measures such as encryption, secure coding practices, and access controls.
Managed multiple collection modes (RTGS, NEFT, IMPS, UPI) while ensuring seamless and secure payment processes, adhering to PCI-DSS compliance.
Designed and developed APIs for high-traffic e-commerce websites.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to optimize application performance and security.
Built APIs for mobile and web applications, focusing on security and scalability.
